heading: HR00556
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC INFORMATION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE REPUBLIC ACT 10639 OR ACT MANDATING THE TELECOMMUNICATIONS SERVICE PROVIDERS TO SEND FREE MOBILE ALERTS IN THE EVENT OF NATURAL AND MANMADE DISASTERS AND CALAMITIES, PARTICULARLY WHEN SUPERTYPHOON LAWIN STRUCK AND DAMAGED MUCH OF NORTHERN LUZON
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC INFORMATION since 2016-11-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00556
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC INFORMATION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE REPUBLIC ACT 10639 OR ACT MANDATING THE TELECOMMUNICATIONS SERVICE PROVIDERS TO SEND FREE MOBILE ALERTS IN THE EVENT OF NATURAL AND MANMADE DISASTERS AND CALAMITIES, PARTICULARLY WHEN SUPERTYPHOON LAWIN STRUCK AND DAMAGED MUCH OF NORTHERN LUZON
